2.3 DUIM-Geometry Module

$everywhere

Constant

Summary

The region that includes all the points on the two-dimensional infinite drawing plane.

Type

<region>

Library

duim-geometry

Module

duim-geometry

Description

The region that includes all the points on the two-dimensional infinite drawing plane.

See also

$nowhere, page 44
